Package de.uni_passau.fim.infosun.se2.chatbot.action

Contains all Actions of the bot.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Specifies an Action that may be run by the bot.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateTimeAction
    Provides an Action to get information about date and time.
    DefaultAction
    An Action that can be used for unknown commands.
    ExitAction
    An Action that terminates the chat-bot execution.
    HelloAction
    Tries to recognize attempts to greet the bot, and responds with a greeting itself and offers its services by chaining the HelloAction.
    HelpAction
    Accepts keywords that request assistance, and responds with a respective message.
    MensaAction
    Provides Actions for the Mensa.
    WeatherAction
    Accepts keywords that indicate inquiries about the weather forecast.

Package de.uni_passau.fim.infosun.se2.chatbot.action Description

Contains all Actions of the bot.
